commands.putFirstLineInTitleUnlessExcluded: Put first line in title (unless excluded)
commands.putFirstLineInTitleAllNotes: Put first line in title in all notes
commands.addSafeInternalLinkWithCaption: Add safe internal link with caption

putFirstLineInTitleNFolders.many: Put first line in title ({{count}} folders)

putFirstLineInTitleNNotes.many: Put first line in title ({{count}} notes)

descriptions.renameActiveNoteEvenExcluded: Rename active note, even if in excluded folder or with excluded tag or property.
descriptions.renameActiveNoteUnlessExcluded: Rename active note except if in excluded folder or with excluded tag or property.
descriptions.renameAllNotesExceptExcluded: Rename all notes in vault except if in excluded folder or with excluded tag or property.
descriptions.stopExcludingActiveNote: Stop excluding active note from renaming.

createLinkWithForbiddenChars.part1: Create internal link with forbidden characters handled as set in

createLinkWithValidPath.part1: Create internal link with forbidden characters handled as set in
createLinkWithValidPath.part2: , and with original text in caption.

descriptions.insertFilename: Insert current filename at cursor position. Convert forbidden character replacements back to their original forms, as set in *Replace characters*.
descriptions.renameNoteEvenExcluded: Rename note, even if in excluded folder or with excluded tag.
descriptions.renameAllNotesInSearchResults: Rename all notes in search results.
descriptions.excludeAllNotesInSearchResults: Exclude all notes in search results.
descriptions.stopExcludingAllNotesInSearchResults: Stop excluding all notes in search results from renaming.

notifications.renamedNotesWithErrors: Renamed {{renamed}}/{{total}} notes with {{errors}} errors. Check console for details.
notifications.noNotesFoundInFolders: No notes found in selected folders.
notifications.failedToDisable: Failed to disable renaming. Check console for details.
notifications.failedToEnable: Failed to enable renaming. Check console for details.
notifications.invalidImportFile: Invalid settings file. Please select a valid JSON file.
notifications.firstTimeNotice: Please open First Line is Title settings to set your preferences. Ensure your files are regularly backed up.
notifications.notRenamedSelfReference: Note not renamed due to self-referential link in first line: {{filename}}
notifications.notRenamedNoHeading: Note not renamed due to no heading in first line: {{filename}}
notifications.notRenamedExcluded: Note not renamed due to being excluded: {{filename}}
notifications.renamingDisabledForNote: To rename this note, remove property to disable renaming.

modals.filesBackedUp: Your files are backed up in case of errors.
modals.exclusionsConfigured: Excluded folders, tags and properties are configured correctly in plugin settings.
modals.ensureFilesBackedUp: Ensure your files are backed up in case of errors.
modals.resetAllSettings: This will reset all plugin settings to their default values and delete all custom rules. This cannot be undone.
modals.addRemoveProperty: This will add/remove the key:value property in {{count}} note(s).
modals.ensureBackup: Ensure your files are backed up in case of errors.

renameNotes.name: Rename notes
renameNotes.desc: Set how notes should be processed.

renameOnFocus.name: Rename on focus
renameOnFocus.desc: Also process notes when they become active in the editor.

onlyRenameIfHeading.name: Only rename if first line is heading
onlyRenameIfHeading.desc: Don't rename notes if the first line is not a heading.

moveCursorToFirstLine.name: Move cursor to first line
moveCursorToFirstLine.desc: Place the cursor in the first line when creating a new note.

placeCursorAtLineEnd.name: Place cursor at line end
placeCursorAtLineEnd.desc: When moving the cursor to a first line with content, place it at the end of the line instead of the start.

disableInExcludedNotes.name: Disable in excluded notes
disableInExcludedNotes.desc: Don't move the cursor when creating notes in excluded folders, or from a template with excluded tags or properties.

desc.part2: automatically insert a new-note template before moving the cursor. Allows to match tags and properties that are set in
desc.part3: , or to position the cursor at the end of the inserted line if

insertTitleOnCreation.name: Insert title in first line on note creation

desc.part1: Place the filename in the first line when creating a new empty note (unless
Convert forbidden character replacements back to their original forms, as set in

desc.part2: automatically insert a new-note template before inserting the filename. The filename will not be inserted if the template adds content below Properties.

formatAsHeading.name: Format as heading
formatAsHeading.desc: Make the first line a heading.

renameOnSave.name: Rename on save
renameOnSave.desc: Rename notes on manual save (Ctrl/Cmd-S on desktop by default) unless excluded.

renameAllNotes.name: Rename all notes
renameAllNotes.desc: Process all notes in the vault. Can also be run from the Command palette.

exclusions.desc: Set how notes should be excluded from processing.
exclusions.note: Note: rules don't override other rules. For example, a note in excluded folder but with included tag will not be processed.

folders.title: Folders
folders.renamedWarning: Renamed, moved or deleted folders are not reflected below. Update manually if paths change.

matchSubfolders.name: Match subfolders
matchSubfolders.desc: Also apply to all subfolders of folders listed below.

exclusionMode.name: Exclusion mode
exclusionMode.desc: Set how folders should be excluded.

tags.title: Tags

excludeAllNote.part2: also excludes notes with no tags.

tags.tagWranglerWarning: Tags renamed with Tag Wrangler are not reflected below. Update manually after renaming.

matchTags.name: Match tags
matchTags.desc: Set where tags should be matched.

matchChildTags.name: Match child tags
matchChildTags.desc: For example, also match #parent/child if #parent is listed below.

exclusionMode.name: Exclusion mode
exclusionMode.desc: Set how tags should be excluded.

properties.title: Properties

leaveBlank.part2: blank to match all notes with this property key.

excludeAllNote.part2: also excludes notes with no properties.

properties.renamedWarning: Renamed property keys aren't reflected below. Update manually after renaming.

exclusionMode.name: Exclusion mode
exclusionMode.desc: Set how properties should be excluded.

disableProperty.title: Property to disable renaming
disableProperty.desc: Set the property to exclude notes from processing.
disableProperty.alwaysRespected: Always respected â€” cannot get overridden by any command.
disableProperty.updateWarning: Changing this will not automatically update properties that have been previously added to notes. Update manually after changing.

addAlias.name: Add alias
addAlias.desc: Always copy the first line to a property when renaming notes.

aliasPropertyName.name: Alias property name
aliasPropertyName.desc: Set the property key in which to insert the alias.
aliasPropertyName.quickSwitcher: Use 'aliases' to make the alias searchable in the Quick switcher and link suggester.
aliasPropertyName.multipleProperties: To populate multiple properties, separate by comma (e.g., 'aliases, title').

noteTitle.part1: This property can be set as note title in

onlyAddIfDiffers.name: Only add alias if first line differs from title
onlyAddIfDiffers.desc: For example, if the filename was truncated, or some characters have been omitted or replaced.

desc.part1: Apply custom text replacements to alias, as set in
Omit markup syntax in alias, as set in

keepEmptyProperty.name: Keep empty alias property
keepEmptyProperty.desc: When the plugin removes the first line alias and no other aliases remain, keep the empty property rather than delete it.

hideProperty.name: Hide alias property
hideProperty.desc: Hide the alias property in Reading view and Live Preview. Will always remain visible in Source view.

hideInSidebar.name: Hide in sidebar
hideInSidebar.desc: Also hide the property in the properties sidebar.

hideMergeNotifications.name: Hide merge notifications
hideMergeNotifications.desc: Suppress notifications about files being modified externally and merged automatically.

desc.part1: First line alias will not update when editing in page preview. Using

replaceCharacters.name: Replace forbidden characters
replaceCharacters.desc: Replace characters which are not allowed in filenames. Forbidden characters are stripped entirely if disabled.

allOSes.title: All OSes
allOSes.desc: Replace characters that are forbidden in Obsidian filenames on all OSes.

note.part2: to remove preceding whitespace in filename. Use

windowsAndroid.title: Windows/Android
windowsAndroid.desc: Replace characters that are forbidden in Obsidian filenames on Windows and Android only.

characters.dotNote: Note: the dot is forbidden at filename start only.

customRules.name: Enable custom rules
customRules.desc: Apply custom text replacements to filename.
customRules.rulesAppliedSequentially: Rules are applied sequentially from top to bottom.

untitledWarning.part3: matches the whole line, the filename becomes

processingOrder.title: Processing order
processingOrder.applyAfterForbidden: Apply after stripping or replacing forbidden characters

stripMarkup.name: Strip markup
stripMarkup.desc: Omit markup syntax in filename when renaming.

codeBlocks.name: Strip code block markup
codeBlocks.desc: Instead, put the first line within code block in title.

commentsEntirely.name: Strip comments entirely
commentsEntirely.desc: Also strip comment content in title.

ribbon.title: Ribbon commands
ribbon.desc: Enable commands in the ribbon menu. Reload plugin or Obsidian to apply.

palette.title: Command palette commands
palette.desc: Enable commands in the Command palette (Ctrl/Cmd-P on desktop by default). Reload plugin or Obsidian to apply.

file.title: File commands
file.desc: Enable commands in the file context menu.

folder.title: Folder commands
folder.desc: Enable commands in the folder context menu.

tag.title: Tag commands
tag.desc: Enable commands in the tag context menu.

search.title: Vault search commands
search.desc: Enable commands in the context menu for search results.

charCount.name: Character count
charCount.desc: The maximum number of characters to put in filename.

notificationMode.name: Show notification when renaming manually
notificationMode.desc: Set when to show notifications for manual rename commands.

preserveModificationDate.name: Preserve original modification date
preserveModificationDate.desc: Don't alter note last modified timestamp when renaming or when modifying Properties.

desc.part1: If a note starts with a card link created with
desc.part3: , the card link title will be put in filename.

newNoteDelay.name: New note delay
newNoteDelay.desc: Delay processing new notes by this amount in milliseconds. May resolve issues on note creation.

contentReadMethod.name: Content read method
contentReadMethod.desc: Set how the plugin reads note content. Cache or file read may resolve issues but will be slower.

checkInterval.name: Check interval
checkInterval.desc: Interval in milliseconds for checking first-line changes. Increase in case of issues.

debug.name: Debug
debug.desc: Log all of the plugin's activity to the developer console.

debugOutputContent.name: Output full file content in console
debugOutputContent.desc: Log the complete content of files (including YAML frontmatter) whenever they are modified.

manageSettings.name: Manage settings
manageSettings.desc: Back up plugin settings to a file or restore from backup.

clearSettings.name: Clear settings
clearSettings.desc: Reset all plugin settings to their default values.

enableSafewords.name: Enable safewords
enableSafewords.desc: Don't rename notes if the filename contains a text string specified below.
